summary: A dataset utility that loads paired 3D MRI volumes and their segmentation masks, partitions each volume into fixed-size subvolumes using a configurable stride, applies optional transforms, supports soft label handling, modality dropout, and optional disk caching for faster repeated access.
business_intent: Enable efficient, patch-based training of deep learning models for 3D MRI segmentation by providing streamlined loading, preprocessing, and caching of subvolume data.
